Dune::LexOrder

Dune::LexOrder< dim > Class Template Reference

#include <numbering.hh>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<int dim>
class Dune::LexOrder< dim >

generate lexicographic ordering in a cube of dimension dim with arbitry size per direction
